name: fo_dev
description: This is a demo for Fair Observer

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.server.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.dist.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.css.js --mode production && python2 scripts/injectcss.py
scripts.develop: echo "building server" && webpack --config webpack.server.js --mode development && echo "server built" && echo "building client"&& webpack --config webpack.dist.js --mode development && echo "client built"  && echo "building css" && webpack --config webpack.css.js --mode development && python2 scripts/injectcss.py && echo "css built"

author: Alexander Coward
